card.title: List of voting events according to

info.lead: A list of all voting events in the National Assembly, corresponding to user query ({text}), for selected committees responsible ({wbs}), sorted by {sortBy}.
text: Seznam vseh glasovanj, ki so se zgodila v tekočem sklicu DZ in so bila objavljena na spletnem mestu {link1} ter ustrezajo uporabniškemu vnosu.
The results are sorted either by discord or by date.

links.text: National Assembly of the Republic of Slovenia
